user_prompt: Generate OmniNode implementation for a user authentication microservice with registration, login, and JWT token management

tasks.description: Generate OmniNode authentication service from PRD specification

input_data.prd_content:
# User Authentication Microservice

## Overview
Implement a secure user authentication service using OmniNode architecture.

## Functional Requirements
1. User registration with email validation
2. Secure password hashing (bcrypt)
3. JWT token generation for authenticated sessions
4. Token validation and refresh mechanism
5. Password reset functionality

## Technical Details
- PostgreSQL database for user credential storage
- Redis cache for session token management
- Email service integration for account verification
- Rate limiting for login attempts (5 attempts per 15 minutes)
- HTTPS-only communication

## Success Criteria
- All user operations complete within 200ms
- 99.9% uptime requirement
- OWASP Top 10 security compliance
- Comprehensive logging and audit trail
